name: Crystal Brawl
description:
4 controllers required. Tested with Xbox 360 and Xbox One controllers in Chrome, Firefox, Edge.

Gauntlet meets NBA Jam in Crystal Brawl, a 2v2 capture-the-flag local multiplayer game that melds fast action with MOBA-like strategy.

Choose from a variety of characters with different abilities, with a notable twist: each character has a unique ability that alters the terrain.

Experiment with different character combinations to uncover hidden strategies!

Download for free on Xbox One, Windows and Chrome!
